CustomField.formula:
case(RecordType.Name,
"Coupon Transaction","2210 - Provision for Coupons",
"Sale Transaction","2101 - Receipts clearing",
"Multi-Line Expense", if( not(isblank( TAD_Booking_Records__c)), TAD_Booking_Records__r.Credit_Card_GLA__c, "2100 - Accounts Payable" ),
"2100 - Accounts Payable"
)
CustomField.label: Control Account
